title: Excitements at the Chalet School
description: The winter term is only a week old, and already the mischief-makers of Inter V have set the Chalet School in an uproar. But their escapades are soon forgotten when Joey Maynard realises that the school is nearly twenty-one years old. Suddenly a million and one plans for the big celebration are in the air - but everyone's surprised when noisy Inter V come up with the most exciting scheme of all!
author: Elinor M. Brent-Dyer
